reviews.review:
Killing Floor was a game i was eyeballing for awhile. I finally got it after awhile , its like a breathe of fresh air for me & i always have fun especially with a few friends.
But , besides that the community within the game is really nice & the steam workshop always have good maps 
& other things. 
Evem though this game doesn't have the best graphics , its still has some pretty fun gameplay. 



10/10.  Would kill zombies again.

Um jogo realmente bom em divertir, e cada dificuldade realmente é verdadeira, por exemplo, o fácil é fácil, o normal é realmente normal, o difícil é realmente difícil. Não é falso igual muitos jogos fazem, você coloca no difícil e é como se não trouxesse desafio nenhum, mas Killing Floor realmente trás.

I have never played this game. I don't know a thing about it. I wouldn't be able to advise you on expert tips, like the crossbow has a 7.8x multiplier for headshots, the Scrake is resistant to explosives, but vulnerable to the Katana. I don't even know what a Scrake is, or that he has a chainsaw for an arm. All I can tell you, is that anyone who has played this for 700 hours + is a psychopath, who obviously enjoys killing Zombies way too much. I would be wary of such people, unless of course you have a penchant for similiar activities. If that is the case, you will enjoy this game......or at least, that is what I have been told, because I wouldn't know?
boff
Das Spiel macht sehr viel spaß.

Игра сделана достаточно убого и крайне бездарно (бездарно почти всё), за исключением оружия, его много и ведёт себя оно довольно реалистично, совместного режима и интересной системы прокачки, всё это заставляет играть в удовольствие
6.5/10

First game played on steam, was extremely fun and enjoyable  and easy to play and understand. This game gradually becomes more fun as your knowledge expands playing it, also very very fun to play with good friends and the community is good as well. I definitely recommend this to anyone interested in the genre of gore, zombie / specimen and or cyborgs. Played another 1k on an alternate account :^()
An excellent game that offers a solo play option as well as a co-op.
很好玩的一款游戏，非常紧张刺激，适合和基友一起玩，期待KF2！

Many of the problem i've sighted on is that this game product is having too many servers that's deserted and maximum player in only one server, servers that changes from 80- to 400+, servers that blocks Eventful Map, foolish newbie on a local Hard, Suicidal and HOE. But the only possible likeness I found is that without Comrades (Players) close to me, and closer to the hordes  , I could've regret the fate of bringing this game, sure they may fool around, coward away, and even daredevil themselves while having the worst opportunities against powerful Zeds, they've could be the source of my determination, talent, skill.
(And for sure one day when KF2 release, please put a perks higher ups for the original KF players, thank you,Tripwire.)

Buy it!

By now, this game is a must have classic.

At first glance it seems like your run of the mill horde survival - but something about it makes it so popular and alluring.

Maybe it's the 6 classes that allow you to alter your play style with certain unlockable skills that passively bolster your Zed-killing potential?

Perhaps it's the multitude of weapons, most of which are real-world weapons, and the amazing feel each gun has?

Maybe the constant content that Tripwire pumps out, ranging from simple skins to free new maps?

Nah, it has to be the amazing metal music that gets you headbanging while you shower in the guts of dead enemies :D

Great FPS game. I don't even like FPS games that much, but this one is specially great!
Worth every single penny.

This is the ultimate dosh simulator game. Want loads of money? Then this is the game for you. Be sure to spam your B key to make it rain money. As you and your teammates amass large sums of money, you will become enlightened. You will soon only see everything as dosh. It's quite the experience. Beautiful even. If you have not experienced this, you are missing out on life. I highly suggest you get this game. And remember....
DOSH, GRAB IT WHILE YOU CAN, LADS. LODSEMONE. IT'S RAINING MONEY. MONEY MONEY MONEYYYYYYY~

Oh, right, there's zeds in it too. So if you're into that. But let's be real here. It's all about the dosh.

Killing Floor is by far my favourite FPS, the fact that it revolves around teamwork makes it extremely fun trying to survive the waves and kill the Patriarch (Final Boss). Trying to survive wave after wave of mutated cloning experiments gone wrong is more fun than it sounds! Though I have only recently bought it, I find it hard to stop playing. The backstories of characters, maps and the start of the apocalyptic world are written in a very intriguing manor. I would recommend buying this game!
Крутая игра ,все советую в неё поиграть!!
fun until its not fun
ОФИГЕННАЯ ИГРА
Awesome fun. Much better with friends.

Un jeu aggressif comme on l'aime avec du sang et des zombies. Excellent pour jouer entre amis ou même seul pour passer le temps. 
Seul point faible qui mérite d'être travailler : un mode histoire qui aurait pu être le bienvenue.
Ca note est mérité !
В этой игре много оружия включая DLC, много скрверов, достаточно много зомби, есть два режима (1-Killing Floor, 2-Режим Задач). Короче покупайте эту игру и сами все увидите.
супер

The overall rating for this game is a blatant lie. It's unbelievable that a game like Killing Floor could rack up an 'overwhelmingly positive' review.

The player and enemy models move around like broomstick-spined pixels from 1995, the guns have terrible sound effects, the levels are blocky uninspired mazes.

And the gameplay... oh my... the awful gameplay.

The maps in Killing Floor are all the same. They all share the same insipid scenario and objective (fight waves of monsters, kill the final boss, repeat).

The base game is a waste of money. Purchasing DLC for this game is unjustifiable.

PLEASE AVOID THIS GAME!

Best Dosh Simulator evah, but srsly, this game has great gameplay and an epic feel to it, whether it be finishing a clot off or ripping apart a flesh pound, you'd feel victory either way.

I like the game. However since I have bought the game I have ran into a lot of different problems. After buying the dlc bundle my killing floor started to crash but without any reasons shown. After deleting killing floor and reinstalling it the crashes stop but now I can't filter servers anymore. It doesn't matter what filters I try to put in place because it completely ignores these settings. I am running killing floor on a mac and despite enjoying the game itself I personally won't recommend this game to others because of the many difficulties i have faced and the solutions I found online weren't very helpful either.

Killing Floor my friend my pal.. What monster what evil has come upon you?Once a promising nobel game who would never... could never exploit your new customers let alone your own existing loyal customers for (financial gain?).At last Killing Floor i no ye not for thou art but a shodow of thou former self for i can hardly see you as thou art coverd in thick haze of PAY TO WIN DLC.(thank you tripwire)For what can one do? give up on my favorite game of all time?(that tripwire did not make but was bought from a group of modders) .No i shall not give up i shall forge ahead i will play ye till my graphics card turns of dust and my processor blows out the side my case I SHALL PLAY YE...BUT i do not need to play with those who use PAY TO WIN DLC for i have my own server and on this server  i have rules .So do i recommend this game? YES i do as i said this is my favorite game if all time.I would just ask that people think before buying PAY TO WIN DLC these have ruined the game in many aspects.I would not mind the DLC if tripwire would just put free guns in the game that compare with the PAY TO WIN DLC.
.........For instance........

1.Flare Revolver..only two weight slots each have tons of ammo can put a SC on hell on earth into a flinch lock.
   ..... where is the free counter part for these guns?..
2.Buzzsaw Bow..the only ranged weapon for zerk class.
  ......where is the free counter part for this weapon?..
3.Single Piston Long Musket..this weapon is powerful 864 damage agianst a SC on hell on eatth while the lever action rifle only does 672 and the musket shoots faster.why tripwire why would you do this? at least up the power of the lever action so its fair...this weapon UPSETS me the most..
4.Seal Squeal. only three head shots to kill a FP on hell on earth with 6 people. PAY TO WIN
   ...where is the counter part for this gun?..
5.Blower Thrower..PAY TO WIN.. i dont see any free med guns like this.
     ...agian where is the counter part for this weapon...
6.Dr T's Lead Delivery System..R.S. Tommy Gun.. both are pay to win simply because the amount of ammo per mag.
   ..why cant the AK get banana mags or drum mags so its fair?

Why is a game that is pay to play also PAY TO WIN? up untill the PAY TO WIN DLC i was hoping that a KF2 would come out but now im afraid..Will KF2 have a day one DLC and worse will it be PAY TO WIN DLC? i really hope not i would love to have my confidence restored in tripwire if they would just add free equal counter parts to the PAY TO WIN guns it would be ok ..but im sure they wont..tripwire has shown their true colors and it saddens me.
....................I hope there are other like minded individuals out there who share my thoughts................
........................................But seriously tripwire get it together..........................................
...............P.S. tripwire i hope you understand why i have not capitalized your name anywhere in this review...........

                                                                                                                                                      SEE YOU ZED KILLERS..

Horror? Yes. I'm scared often by this game's atmosphere and adreniline inducing enemys. Yet it falls short on replayability. You'll likely play a map five times and get bored of it. And there's not an endless amout of maps. But this is where multiplayer comes in! This game is much better with a friend than alone or with other people on multiplayer.
игра интересная.рекомендую!

Добрый простой ко-оп шутер без сюжета и ультра-современной графики, но тем не менее затягивает тебя с головой, и все равно, время от времени ты продолжаешь возвращаться в игру тк все таки это добротная убивалка времени. Присутсвует некая система прокачки персонажа, которая добавляет некие плюшки твоему классу (их 7). Добавлю только то, что рекомендую покупать эту игру только на распродаже, ибо 300 рублей она все таки не стоит.

This game is such a yoyo when it comes to recommending it.
 On the one hand its a fun, fast paced and well balanced shooter that any fan of the fps can get into. It looks grimy and dingy due to the theme so the graphics still hold up ok. The community is fairly supportive and creates enough user made content to be interesting even now.
However and i cannot stress this enough, the reason i cannot recommend this game is the technical aspect. 
The creaters of this game give absolutly no shits about the thousands of users who suffer constant crashes due to their awful programming skills. Go to the steam forrums and see what you find. since 2009 report after report of the SAME game breaking glitch has been reported and Tripwire has done NOTHING. So if your a whiz at going to your steam directory and sorting out which specific file is causing the problem go ahead and buy this game, otherwise? Stay the hell away from killing floor. Its not worth the screen punching lvl of frustration you get from playing a match all the way to the 10th wave only to have your game crash.
Sorry for any spelling errors, my keyboard is dying.
